news.title: Xiu Xiu to Pull Music From Spotify
news.summary: The band joins Deerhoof in protesting chief executive Daniel Ek’s military investments

news.title: Glorilla Arrested for Marijuana Possession by Police Investigating Burglary of Her Home
news.summary: Police officers said they found a “significant amount of marijuana” at an Atlanta home owned by Glorilla, who has been released on bond

news.title: Chappell Roan Announces U.S. Concert Series
news.summary: The pop musician will bring Visions of Damsels & Other Dangerous Things to New York, her native Missouri, and California

news.title: Watch Wednesday’s Video for New Song “Pick Up That Knife”
news.summary: Another preview of the Asheville band’s upcoming album Bleeds
